ref: 3449 kr̥ṣṭá ʻ drawn, ploughed ʼ, n. ʻ ploughed land ʼ ŚBr. [Doubtful whether there is identity or connexion with √*kaḍḍh which largely replaced √kr̥ṣ]
Pa. kaṭṭha -- ʻ ploughed ʼ, kiṭṭha -- ʻ growing corn, cornfield ʼ;
Pk. kaṭṭha -- ʻ furrowed ʼ, kiṭṭha -- ʻ ploughed ʼ; --
wel. kišt -- ʻ to be taken for a drive, to ride ʼ?
wel. kišt -- ʻ to be taken for a drive, to ride ʼ?
